snippet: The Union Pacific Railroad says 6,500 gallons of oil spilled when a train derailed in northern Colorado on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Oil Train Spill Put at 6,500 Gallons
headline.main: Colorado Oil Train Spill Put at 6,500 Gallons

lead_paragraph: The Union Pacific Railroad says 6,500 gallons of oil spilled when a train derailed in northern Colorado on Friday.
